name: Existek
description:
Existek is innovation-driven outsourcing software development company. We focus on helping our customers to gain competitive advantage with best in its class custom software solutions.
Existek provides fully manageable offshore dedicated development team service for software companies worldwide and custom software development service for wide range of industries including Business Intelligence, Healthcare, Oil & Gas and Education.
Our Services:
-Custom Software Development
-Software Product Development
-Dedicated Development Center
-IT Staff Augmentation
For more information, please visit existek.com
